QuestData.Title: I See Dead Arakkoa
QuestData.Description: Say, while you're here would you mind helping me out with a major problem?$B$BThe workers keep saying that they're seeing the ghost of the head arakkoa that used to be here.$B$BI don't believe it for a second but could you take my Ghostogrifier 12000 to her body and check?$B$BIf they're not crazy, it'll prove it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Ghostogrifier 12000 and kill the spirit of Talonpriest Zekk.
